Aries.title: Your Moon Sign is Aries (Mesh)
Aries.personality:
🧠 Nature:
Bold, honest, quick-tempered, but soft-hearted. Loves independence, hates delays.

❤️ Love Nature:
Passionate, loyal, intense. Gets attached fast, a bit possessive.

🪔 Spiritual Tip:
Worship Hanuman or Mars (Mangal).
Mantra: Om Angarakaya Namah

Taurus.title: Your Moon Sign is Taurus (Vrishabh)
Taurus.personality:
🧠 Nature:
Calm, grounded, and determined. Loves beauty, luxury, and routine.

❤️ Love Nature:
Loyal, slow to open up, but deeply committed. May be possessive.

🪔 Spiritual Tip:
Worship Lakshmi or Venus (Shukra).
Mantra: Om Shrim Shukraya Namah

Gemini.title: Your Moon Sign is Gemini (Mithun)
Gemini.personality:
🧠 Nature:
Smart, curious, talkative, and quick-witted. Loves change and variety.

❤️ Love Nature:
Playful, flirty, but inconsistent. Needs mental stimulation in love.

🪔 Spiritual Tip:
Worship Lord Vishnu or Mercury (Budh).
Mantra: Om Bum Budhaya Namah

Cancer.title: Your Moon Sign is Cancer (Karka)
Cancer.personality:
🧠 Nature:
Emotional, nurturing, and intuitive. Highly protective of loved ones.

❤️ Love Nature:
Loyal and loving, but moody. Needs emotional security in relationships.

🪔 Spiritual Tip:
Worship Lord Shiva or Moon (Chandra).
Mantra: Om Chandraya Namah

Leo.title: Your Moon Sign is Leo (Simha)
Leo.personality:
🧠 Nature:
Proud, bold, and creative. Loves attention and leadership roles.

❤️ Love Nature:
Romantic, loyal, and expressive. Needs admiration from their partner.

🪔 Spiritual Tip:
Worship Sun (Surya) or recite Aditya Hridayam.
Mantra: Om Suryaya Namah

Virgo.title: Your Moon Sign is Virgo (Kanya)
Virgo.personality:
🧠 Nature:
Analytical, detail-oriented, and modest. Loves cleanliness and order.

❤️ Love Nature:
Caring and loyal, but critical at times. Shows love through actions.

🪔 Spiritual Tip:
Worship Lord Vishnu or Mercury (Budh).
Mantra: Om Namo Bhagavate Vasudevaya

Libra.title: Your Moon Sign is Libra (Tula)
Libra.personality:
🧠 Nature:
Charming, balanced, and diplomatic. Seeks fairness and beauty in life.

❤️ Love Nature:
Romantic and peace-loving. Hates conflict, loves harmony in relationships.

🪔 Spiritual Tip:
Worship Goddess Lakshmi or Venus (Shukra).
Mantra: Om Shrim Mahalakshmyai Namah

Scorpio.title: Your Moon Sign is Scorpio (Vrishchik)
Scorpio.personality:
🧠 Nature:
Intense, secretive, and powerful. Loves depth and emotional intensity.

❤️ Love Nature:
Passionate, possessive, and loyal. Struggles with trust but loves deeply.

🪔 Spiritual Tip:
Worship Lord Hanuman or Mars (Mangal).
Mantra: Om Hanumate Namah

Sagittarius.title: Your Moon Sign is Sagittarius (Dhanu)
Sagittarius.personality:
🧠 Nature:
Adventurous, optimistic, and spiritual. Loves freedom and exploration.

❤️ Love Nature:
Honest and open, but commitment-shy. Loves a partner who shares ideals.

🪔 Spiritual Tip:
Worship Lord Vishnu or Jupiter (Guru).
Mantra: Om Brim Brihaspataye Namah

Capricorn.title: Your Moon Sign is Capricorn (Makar)
Capricorn.personality:
🧠 Nature:
Disciplined, practical, and responsible. Goal-oriented and hardworking.

❤️ Love Nature:
Reserved but loyal. Shows love through stability and long-term vision.

🪔 Spiritual Tip:
Worship Lord Shani or Saturn (Shani).
Mantra: Om Sham Shanicharaya Namah

Aquarius.title: Your Moon Sign is Aquarius (Kumbh)
Aquarius.personality:
🧠 Nature:
Innovative, independent, and humanitarian. Thinks outside the box.

❤️ Love Nature:
Unconventional, friendly, but detached. Loves intellectual bonding.

🪔 Spiritual Tip:
Worship Lord Shiva or Saturn (Shani).
Mantra: Om Namah Shivaya

Pisces.title: Your Moon Sign is Pisces (Meen)
Pisces.personality:
🧠 Nature:
Dreamy, sensitive, and imaginative. Deeply emotional and intuitive.

❤️ Love Nature:
Romantic and selfless. Sometimes overly idealistic or escapist.

🪔 Spiritual Tip:
Worship Lord Vishnu or Jupiter (Guru).
Mantra: Om Namo Narayanaya
